特記事項: 本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。 The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
授業方法: This class will be held in English as a communicative 4-skills workshop. Active participation is expected from all students.

成績評価Grading0: 評価基準等　Grading Criteria etc.
評価.成績評価Grading2:
備考　Note
30% Participation
24% Written reports/presentations
10% Weekly quizzes
16% Mid-semester and Final in-class Tests
20% Other homework (vocabulary/grammar review, worksheets, surveys, etc)

There is no final examination(定期試験).
